name: Lolliflat
description:
A flat, almost borderless theme for Firefox.
Note: does not work on Firefox 57+

In addition to this stylish theme, the browser in the screenshot also uses:
- Firefox "Lollipop Road" theme (Win/Mac/Linux/BSD)
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/lollipop-road/
- XFWM "Chrome window title bar" (Linux/BSD XFCE only)
https://www.xfce-look.org/p/1165642/

Optional: uncomment a line in the css code to also remove the light border above the navbar.
